ItemDesc: When used, all allies' Basic ATK DMG dealt in the next battle increases by <unbreak>45%</unbreak> and Skill DMG dealt decreases by <unbreak>12%</unbreak>.
ItemBGDesc: People might be more inclined to please others than themselves. However, my dear friend, I still hope you can play a song for yourself, a song unbeknownst to all and unheard by another's ear. Then, laugh out loud â€” as the audience, as well as the performer.\n\n"Life is like a grand soliloquy."
